name: clear_nav_data
description: Clears specified navigational data to free up storage space and optimize system performance.

file_id.description: The ID of the file to clear from the storage.

name: adjust_power_level
description: Adjust the power level of a specified system.

system_id.description: The ID of the system to adjust power levels for.

name: list_system_status
description: List all currently active systems and their statuses.

name: access_space_mission_data
description: Access detailed and sensitive space mission data.

name: get_base_information
description: Retrieve general information about a specified base.

base_name.description: The name of the base to get information for.
